Constructs a sentinel.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying sentinel (denoted as {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}}) with {{c|ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;()}}.
@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying sentinel {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} with the corresponding member of {{c|i}}.

This type also has a private constructor which is used by {{lc|ranges::adjacent_view::end|adjacent_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users.
